receiveCoapRequest(CoapRequest) - Method in class de.uniluebeck.itm.spitfire.nCoap.application.SimpleCoapServerApplication
This method makes the server to wait for 5 seconds before it returns a static response (Code 205, Content: "This is a response!")

The method to be called by the ResponseCallbackHandler when there was response reveived (both, piggy-backed or seperated).

removeAllOptions(OptionRegistry.OptionName) - Method in class de.uniluebeck.itm.spitfire.nCoap.message.options.OptionList
